VideoEncoderConfigure.summary: The configure() method of the interface changes the of the encoder to "configured" and asynchronously prepares the encoder to accept s for encoding with the specified parameters. If the encoder doesn't support the specified parameters or can't be initialized for other reasons an error will be reported via the error callback provided to the constructor.

remarks.para: If the has been previously configured, the new configuration will not be applied until all previous tasks have completed.
